name: Dashy Crashy
description:
*GAME OF THE WEEK* - Touch Arcade
*GAME OF THE WEEK* - Pocket Gamer

Dangerous driving, luck & reflexes.
Let's DASHY CRASHY!

[HOW TO PLAY]
• SWIPE to change direction & speed
• Don't crash :(
• Collect coins to unlock new cars

Thanks for playing!

• ENDLESS road trip
• Unlock 90+ GAME CHANGING cars
• Easy SWIPE controls
• Crazy CRASHES
• Outrun FRIENDS with GameCentre
• Play on iOS & AppleTV

Dashy Crashy <3

• “Amongst a TON of quality competition, the outstanding Dashy Crashy comes out on top” - Touch Arcade
• “Utterly compulsive mobile gaming” - The Guardian
• “Intensely colourful and breathtakingly fast” - BAFTA
• “A must have for casual & competitive gamers” - GameMob
